GK16visa04cu:5: evaṃ kāvyasya svarūpamuktvā viśeṣaṃ nirūpayitumavatārayati--atheti---bhidyate aneneti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:10: vācyādadhikacamatkāriṇi vyaṅgyārthe dhvanyate 'sminniti vyutpattyā dhvanirnāmottamaṃ kāvyam /
GK16visa04cu:13: (vi, ka) kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte tadeva kāvyaṃ katividhamityākāṅkṣāyāmāha---kāvyaṃ dhvanirityādi /
GK16visa04cu:14: dhvanyate 'sminniti--dhvanyate vyajyate vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdādinā asmin kāvye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:22: (lo, i) lakṣaṇābhidhā ca mūle kāraṇer'thād vyaṅgyāt vyañjane yayoḥ /
GK16visa04cu:23: yasya dhvaneḥ vyaṅgyārtharūpopādhilakṣaṇābhidhāmūlatvena dvaividhyapratipādanām tadupādhikasya kāvyasya dvaividhyam /
GK16visa04cu:24: dhvaniśabdo hyanekārthaḥ, tathā hi dhvanyata iti dhvaniḥ, śabdādigatā śaktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:32: atra hi vācyor'thaḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayanneva vyaṅgyārthasya prakāśakaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:39: avivakṣitamiti---vācyāvivakṣāyāṃ bījamāha---bādhitasvarūpamiti---vācyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa vivakṣābhāvāt tena rūpeṇa bādho viśiṣṭābhāvarūpaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:40: tena ajahatsvārthātmikāyām upādānalakṣaṇāyāṃ vācyasyābādhe 'pi vācyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa tadvādhaḥṣa jahatsvārthāyāṃ tu arthayoreva bādhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:49: avivakṣitavācye lakṣyor'thaḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayan vyaṅgyārthaṃ prakāśayati,
GK16visa04cu:59: (lo, u) saṃkamiti iti --- yogakākvādisāhāyyasūcanaṃ vācye iti kākākṣinyāyenobhayatra sambadhyate /
GK16visa04cu:70: atyantaṃ tiraskṛta iti---vācyārthasyāvacchedakāntareṇāpi avivakṣaṇāt atyantaṃ tiraskāraḥ,
GK16visa04cu:75: atra dvitīyakadalyādiśabdāḥ paunaruktyabhiyā sāmānyakadalyādirūpe mukhyārthe bādhitā jāḍyādiguṇaviśiṣṭakadalyādirūpamarthaṃ bodhayanti /
GK16visa04cu:80: camūrudṛśaḥ hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ ūruyugaṃ bhuvanatritaye 'pi kasyāpi tulāṃ sādṛśyaṃ na bibharttotyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:81: tathā ca tena kasyāpi sādṛśyādhāraṇāt ko 'pi tadupamānaṃ na astītyatrāha---kadalīti /
GK16visa04cu:82: kadalī rambhā karabhaḥ ūrvākāraḥ paṇipārśvabhāgaḥ“maṇibandhādākaniṣṭhaṃ karasya karabho bahiḥ “iti koṣāt /
GK16visa04cu:85: eṣu uddeśyeṣu dvitīyakadalyādipadānāṃ paunaruktyāt tadarthānāṃ vidheyatvāsambhavāt tāni padāni jāḍyādiviśiṣṭakadalyādiparāṇi /
GK16visa04cu:87: tataḥ kadalī jāḍyā karabho 'śobhanaḥ karirājakaraḥ karkaśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:89: yatra punaḥ svārthaṃ sarvathā parityajannarthāntare pariṇamati,
GK16visa04cu:94: atyantatiraskṛta iti kārikāpadārthaṃ vivṛṇoti---yatra punariti--atra pariṇamatītyupacārapadaprayogaḥ tena pravartate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:98: atrāndhaśabdo mukhyārthe bādhite 'prakāśarūpamarthaṃ bodhayati, aprakāśātiśayaśca vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:103: niḥ śvāsena andhaḥ ādarśa iva candramā na prakāśate na dīpyate /
GK16visa04cu:105: tathā ca niḥ śvāsena aprakāśa ādarśa ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:106_0: nanu śakyatāvacchedakabhinnena aprakāśatvena rūpeṇa bodhanāt kathaṃ neyamarthāntarasakramitavācyalakṣaṇā
GK16visa04cu:106_2: yadi tadviśeṣo bhavet tadā eva arthāntarasaṃkramiti vācyalakṣaṇā /
GK16visa04cu:107: yathā ghaṭapadasya nīlaghaṭapadatve atra tu lakṣyatāvacchedakamaprakāśatvameva sāmānyam /
GK16visa04cu:108: andhatvameva tadviśeṣa iti ato na tathā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:109: idaṃ tu prāyikameva na sārvatrikaṃ “rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe “ityatra duḥ khasahiṣṇutvarāmatvayoḥ karabhaḥ karabhaḥ ityatra śobhārāhityakarabhatvayośca tathātvābhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:115: bhaṇa dhammia vīsattho, so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16visa04cu:119: (vi, ca) bhama dhammia ityatrāpi viparīlakṣaṇābhramaṃ keṣāñcit nirasayitumāha---bhameti /
GK16visa04cu:120: bhrama dhārmika viśvastaḥ sa śvādya māritastena /
GK16visa04cu:123: godāvarī nadī tattīre kuñje kṛtaṃketāyāḥ tatraiva pratidinaṃ puṣpāvacayanena tatsaṃketabhañjakaṃ svapoṣitakukkuropadraveṇāpi anivṛttaṃ dhārmikaṃ prati utkirayam /
GK16visa04cu:126: atra “bhrama dhārmika--” ityato bhramaṇasya vidhiḥ prakṛte 'nupayujyamānatayā bhramaṇaniṣedhe paryavasyatīti viparītalakṣaṇāśaṅkāna kāryā /
GK16visa04cu:127: yatra khalu vidhiniṣaidhāvutpatsyamānāveva niṣadhavidhyoḥ paryavasyatastatraiva tadavasaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:131_0: bhramaṇavidhiḥ prakṛte anupapadyamānatayā iti---siṃhavattvena kathite svasaṃketasthale
GK16visa04cu:133: taddaśāyāṃ kvacit vidhiḥ niṣedhe kvacit niṣedho vidhau paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:134: tatra taddaśāyāṃ vidheḥ niṣedhe paryavasānaṃ yathā--- aunnidṣaṃ daurbalyaṃ cintālasatvaṃ saniḥ śvasitam /
GK16visa04cu:135: mama mandabhāginyāḥ kṛte sakhi tvāmapi paribhavati //
GK16visa04cu:136: ityatra nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhavākye mama kṛte iti vidheḥ na mama kṛte iti lakṣaṇayā paryavasānam /
GK16visa04cu:137_0: niṣedhasya vidhau paryavasānaṃ yathā---“mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyāmāvayornimaṅkṣāsi
GK16visa04cu:137_1: “iti svayaṃ dūtikāyā uktau svaśayyāyāṃ gamananiṣedhasya svaśayyāyāmāgamanavidhau
GK16visa04cu:138: yattu niḥ śeṣacyutacandanamityādāvapi tadantikagamananiṣedhasya tadantikagamanavidhau lakṣaṇayā paryavasānamiti granthakṛtā pūrvamuktaṃ tanna ruciram,
GK16visa04cu:139_0: tatra bhrama dhārmika ityādāviva prathamaṃ vācyaniṣedhasyaiva bodhāt uttarakālamevādhamatvokteścyutanirmṛṣṭapadagrīṣmakālapulakakathanāt
GK16visa04cu:140: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtā tatra tadantikagamanavidheḥ vyaṅgyatvamevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:145: yatra punaḥ prakaraṇādiparyālocanena vidhiniṣadhayorniṣedhavidhī avagamyete tatra dhvanitvameva /
GK16visa04cu:149: (vi, ja) tatra dhvanitvameveti---vyaṅgyatvamevetyarthaḥ, na tu lakṣyatvamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:151: tadvat ihāpi prathamaṃ bhramaṇavidhiḥ śaktyaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:152: paścādeva tasyāḥ kulaṭātvasya prakaraṇādinā pratītau bhramaṇaniṣedho vyañjanayaiva pratīyate,
GK16visa04cu:162: yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣanivāsasya yathā vā “upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate “ityapakāriṇaṃ pratyuktvā upakārasya ca prathamameva bādhyatayā khyātiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:165: uttaratra abhidhaiva tu ityuktyā niṣedhavidhyostu vyaṅgyatvameveti darśitam /
GK16visa04cu:168: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyārthasyāpyabhidhāne yatparatvena khyātasya bādhane 'pyabhidhāvyāpārasvīkārīt /
GK16visa04cu:171: atrādye mukhāyārthasyārthāntare saṃkramaṇaṃ praveśaḥ, na tu tirobhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:180: ata eveti svārthaṃ svāśrayaśabdasya mukhyārthamajahatī upasthāpayantī ajahatsvārthā (rājadantādisamāsasiddha)
GK16visa04cu:181: naca kadalī kadalītyādau prathamakadalīpadenaiva sadalyā upasthitau tatra lakṣyārthasya jaḍatāyā abhedānvayasambhave kimarthaṃ kadalyaṃśe lakṣaṇeti vācyam,
GK16visa04cu:196: vācyajñānāntaraṃ vyaṅgyajñānaṃ jāyate iti kramo yatra apariceya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:202: tatra ca rasavati kāvye jhaṭityāsvādaparyantagamanādvastvalaṅkārarūpavyaṅgyayorapi pratītirna vilambitā,
GK16visa04cu:207: eko 'pi bhedo 'nantatvāt saṃkhyeyastasya naiva yat // VisSd_4.5 //
GK16visa04cu:220: tathāhi---ekasyaiva “śṛṅgārasyaiko 'pi saṃbhogarūpo bhedaḥ parasparāliṅganādharapānacumbanādibhedāt pratyekaṃ ca nibhāvādivaicitryātsaṃkhāyatumaśkyaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:224: (vi, ḍa) eko 'pi bheda ityādikaṃ vyācaṣṭe--eṣu ceti /
GK16visa04cu:236: lakṣyakramavyaṅgyadhvaniṃ vibhajati---śabdārthobhayeti--tatra anusvānasānnebha iti yaduktaṃ tad vyācaṣṭe---kramalakṣyatvādevānuraṇanarūpa iti /
GK16visa04cu:238: sa hi prathamadhvaneranantaraṃ jāyate tadutpattikramaśca lakṣyate tat tulyo yo vyaṅgyastasya traividhyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tasya śabdaśaktyudbhavatvena iti /
GK16visa04cu:240: na tu abhidhārūpā vṛttiḥ tayā vyaṅgyābodhanāt arthasya tadabhāvācca /
GK16visa04cu:241: tena sāmarthyaina udbhava utpannaviṣayatā yasya tādṛśavyaṅgyasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:242: tat traividhyāt tatsambandhena saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyanāmno dhvanikāvyasya traividhyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:258: tatra kāvyasya śaktyutthatvaprayojakaṃ śabdaśaktyudbhavaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ dvidhā vibhajati---tatra vastvalaṅkārarūpatvāditi /
GK16visa04cu:259: pṛthak upādānāditi vastutvasya kevalānvayitvena alaṅkārasyāpi vastutvāt /
GK16visa04cu:263: alaṅkāraśabdasya puṃliṅgatvena tasya nañ tatpuruṣe liṅgatyāgābhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:265: panthi a ! ṇa ettha sattharamatthi maṇaṃ pattharatthale gāme /
GK16visa04cu:266: uṇṇaa paoharaṃ pekkhia ūṇa jai vasati tā vasasu //
GK16visa04cu:274: na ceha strastaraśabdasya śāstrārthatvena upamādhvaniḥ; sādṛśyasyāvivakṣitatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:277: atra sattharādiśabdaśaktyā yadyupabhogakṣamo 'si tadāssveti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:280: (vi, ta) panthia ṇa ettheti-- “pathika nātra strastaramasti manāk prastarasthale grāme /
GK16visa04cu:284: he pathika ! prastarasthale 'tra grāme manāk svalpamapi strastaraṃ śayanīyāstaraṇaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa04cu:285: prastara evaṃ vayaṃ svamipa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:287: unnatamudbhūtaṃ payodharaṃ meghaṃ prekṣya gamanapratibandhāt yadi vastumicchasi tadā vasa iti āpātato bhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:290: prakaraṇaniyantraṇavaśāt sor'tho vyaṅgyastathā ca “paradārānna gacchedi ti smṛtyādiśāstraṃ nāsti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:292_0: tathā hi śayyāvirahāt prastarasthaṃ strījanaṃ puruṣo lātiratyarthaṃ gṛhṇāti iti prastarasthalaḥ
GK16visa04cu:292_1: tatra ityarthena uttuṅgastanadarśanena ca” yadyupabhogakṣametyādi“vyañjanāt paramparayā śabdaśaktimūlatā /
GK16visa04cu:295_2: kalpyate tadatra umāvallabha umāvallabha ivetyupamālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:300: dvitīyārthaḥ pārvatyādiḥ tena sūcitaṃ pārvatīvallabhasya varṇṇanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:303: ataḥ kaverīśvarabhānudavayorupamānopameyabhāve tātparyyāt upamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate saṃvyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:314: he harṣada prabho ! samitaḥ yuddhāt prāptaurutkarṣairamitaḥ aparicchinnosi,
GK16visa04cu:315: utkarṣabāhulyāt tvaṃ kīdṛśaḥ asatāmahitaḥ śatruḥ sādhuyaśobhiḥ sahitaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:323: hitena rahitaḥ kathaṃ tena yukta iti virodhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:325: apiśabdasadbhāve“kupatimapi kalatravallabhamityādau apiśabdabalāt jhaṭiti viruddhārtha evābhāsate /
GK16visa04cu:327: amita ityādau tu aperabhāvāt prākaraṇikatayā prathamam aviruddhārtha eva pratibhāsate /
GK16visa04cu:328: anantaram amitaḥ sankathaṃ samiti iti virodhapratibhāsanād virodhābhāso vyaṅgya iti /
GK16visa04cu:329: apiśabdābhāvādityupalakṣaṇamaḥ anyeṣāmapi virodhabhidhāyi śabdānāmabhāve 'pi virodhābhāsasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa04cu:334: (vi, dha) nanu vyaṅgyārtha eva āsvādyaḥ tasya śobhako yaḥ sa evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:335: tathā ca upamādervyaṅgyatve pareṇa śobhyamāna eva saḥ na śobhakaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:336: tatkathamatra vyaṅgyopamāderalaṅkāratvamityata āha---vyaṅgyasyeti--alaṅkāryyatve vācyālaṅkārantareṇaiva śobhyatve 'pi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:337: śramaṇaḥ sanyāsī taddaśāyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇyābhāve 'pi yathā tasya daśāntarīyaṃ brāhmaṇyamādāya
GK16visa04cu:340: vastu vālaṅkṛtirvāpi dvidhārthaḥ sambhavī svataḥ // VisSd_4.7 //
GK16visa04cu:341: kaveḥ prauṭhoktisiddho vā tannibaddhasya veti ṣaṭ /
GK16visa04cu:354: arthaśaktyudbhavaṃ darśāyituṃ vyañjakārthasya vastvalaṅkārarūpadvividhasya svataḥ sambhavitvāditrauvidhyena ṣaḍvidhatvamāha--vastu vālaṅkṛtirveti /
GK16visa04cu:363: dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini ! kṣaṇamihāpyasmadgṛhe dāsyasi prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati /
GK16visa04cu:364: ekākinyapi yāmi satvaramitaḥ strotastamālākulaṃ nīrandhrāḥ tanumālikhantu jaraṭhacchedānalagranthayaḥ //
GK16visa04cu:367: (vi, pa) svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyaṃ vastvāha--dṛṣṭiṃ he iti /
GK16visa04cu:368: nadījalānayanavartmani vane kṛtasaṃketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ tajjalānayanacchalena jigamiṣorbhāvinakhakṣatasamvaraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:370: asya madīyasya śiśoḥ pitā kulaṭātvāt svapatitvenānuktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:371: virasāḥ svādārahitāḥ kaupīḥ kūpasambandhinīḥ apaḥ jalībhiprāyeṇa ityanena mama bādhyādinā aśaktidine pibatītyuktam /
GK16visa04cu:376: atra svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā tat pratipādikāyā bhāvaparapuṣopayogajanakhakṣatādigopanarūpaṃ vastumātraṃ vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:379: (vi, pha) svataḥ sambhavineti---asya ślokārthasyānalīkatvena pramāṇāntareṇāpi gamyatvasambhavāt /
GK16visa04cu:382: tasyāmeva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire //
GK16visa04cu:383: atra svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā ravitejaso raghupratāpo 'dhika iti vyatirekālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:393: atropamālaṅkāreṇa svataḥ sambhavinā vyañjakārthena baladevaḥ kṣaṇenaiva veṇudāriṇaḥ kṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:397: āpatantam āgacchantam amuṃ veṇudārināmāsuraṃ rāmo balarāmaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:398: veṇudāriṇaḥ kṣayamiti balopamānasya siṃhasya veṇudāryupamānamātrasaṃkṣayakaritvena tadupamānopameyayorapi taddharmalābhāt /
GK16visa04cu:402: atra svataḥ sambhavinā virodhālaṅkāreṇādharo nirdaṣṭaḥ śatravo vyāpāditāśceti samuccayālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:406: yo rājā yudhi nijādharaṃ nirdaśan arivadhūjanasya oṣṭharūpāṇi vidrumasya pravālasya dalāni ratakālīnagāḍhakāntadaśanakṣatavyathārūpāt saṃkaṭādāpado 'mocayat /
GK16visa04cu:407: yudhi krodhena svādharaṃ nirdaśya tatpatiṃ hatvā tathā cakāretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:408: atreti---adharadaṃśakatvādharadaṃśamocakatvayoḥ vastugatyā avirodhe 'pi āpatato virodhasya ābhāsamānatvāt virodhābhāsālaṅkāreṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:410: cakāradvayasya samaṃ śabdasya vābhāvāt vyaṅgyaeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:414: tathā hyatra svādharanirdaṃśanaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ vairistrīṇām oṣṭānāṃ ca kāntadantakṣatamocanaṃ kāryabhūtaṃ samakālatayā nirdiṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:415: kiñcātra nirddaṃśanarūpakarapiśāco mamādharaṃ valirūpaṃ prāpyānyānadharān sukhinaḥ karotviti buddhvaiva
GK16visa04cu:416: nijādharaṃ daṣṭavāniti tasya rājñaḥ vuddhimapekṣya utprekṣā ca /
GK16visa04cu:423: (lo, u) sajjeti---“sajjayati surabhimāso na cārpayati yuvatijanalakṣyasahān /
GK16visa04cu:430: puṣpāṇi śarā iti kaviprauḍhoktisiddhaṃ vastu prakāśībhavan madanavijṛmbhaṇarūpaṃ vastu vyanakti /
GK16visa04cu:438: surabhimāso 'bhinavasahakāramukhān abhinavāni sahakārāṇi mukham ādiryeṣāṃ tādṛśān anaṅgasya śarān sajjayati /
GK16visa04cu:440: śarasajjanasya varttamānatvāt aniṣpannatvena tanniṣpattyānantarameva tādṛśalakṣyaśate 'rpayituṃ prerayiṣyati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:443: anaṅgaśarān kīdṛśān-navapallavapattalān navapallavaiḥ pattalā patraracanā yeṣāṃ tādṛśān /
GK16visa04cu:445: vastuprakāśībhavaditi-- na ca surabhimāsādau śarakārādirūpakālaṅkāra eva prakāśībhavati ityato 'laṅkārasyaiva vyañjakatvamātreti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:446: surabhimāsādau śarakārādyabhedāprakāśāt kintu surabhimāsādau kharasajjanādereva prakāśāt /
GK16visa04cu:448: “rajanīṣu vimalabhānoḥ karajālena prakāśitaṃ vīra ! dhavalayati bhuvanamaṇḍalamakhilaṃ tava kītisaṃtatiḥ satam” //
GK16visa04cu:453: he vīravimalabhānoḥ nirmalakiraṇasya candrasya karajālena bhuvanamaṇḍalaṃ dhavalayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:454: vyatirekālaṅkāra iti---adhikakālaṃ vyāpya prakāśanāt upamānāt candrakarāt ādhikyarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:462: daśānanasya kirīṭebhyaḥ maṇivyājena maṇipatanacchalena rākṣasaśriyaḥ aśrubindavaḥ pṛthivyāṃ paryastāḥ patitāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:465: “dhammille navamallikāsamudayo haste sitāmbhoruhaṃ hāraḥ kaṇṭhataṭe payodharayuge śrīkhaṇḍalepo ghanaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:468: atra kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa bhūmiṣṭho 'pi svargasthānāmupakāraṃ karoṣīti vibhāvanālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:472: he trikaliṅgabhūmitilaka ! kaliṅgadeśabhūtrayātilaka ! eko 'pi tava kīrtirāśiḥ purandarapurīvāmabhruvāṃ surāṅganānāṃ vigrahe śarīre nānāmaṇḍanatāṃ yayau /
GK16visa04cu:480: sumukhai ! yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:481: atrānena kavinibaddhasya kasyacitkāminaḥ prauḍhoktisiddhena vastunā tavādharaḥ puṇyātiśayalabhya iti vastu pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:485: asau śukaśāvakaḥ kka nu śikhariṇi kasmin parvate kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānaṃ kiṃ nāmakaṃ tapaḥ akarot /
GK16visa04cu:486: yena hetunā tava adharavat pāṭalaṃ bimbaphalaṃ daśāti /
GK16visa04cu:487: tava adharatulyavastudaṃśanamapi tapaḥ phalamiti ślokasya bhāvarathaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:491_1: vastunā śarāṇāṃ pañcatā śarān vimucya viyoginaḥ śriteve tyutprekṣālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:500: sambodhanāt kāmuka evātra vaktā natu kaviḥ /
GK16visa04cu:506: atra kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktisiddhenotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa kāmasyāyamunmādakaḥ kālaḥ prāptastatkathaṃ mānini mānaṃ na muñcasīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:513: ata eva kathaṃmānaṃ na muñcasi iti vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:519: (lo, ū) mahilāsahastrabharite tava hṛdaye subhaga sāmāntī /
GK16visa04cu:522: atrāmāantīti kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa tanostanūkaraṇo 'pi tava hṛdaye na vartata iti viśeṣoktyalaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:529: nāyakasya bahunāyikābhāvanāduḥ khena kṛśāyā nāyikāyā avasthāṃ nāyake kathayantyāstatsakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:530_0: mahilā strī tāsāṃ sahastreṇa bharite tava hṛdaye amāntī avakāśamalabhamānā sā anudinaṃ
GK16visa04cu:530_1: divasaṃ vyāpya ananyakarmmā tyaktānyakāryyā satī tanu svataḥ kṛśaṃ aṅgaṃ tanayati
GK16visa04cu:534: hṛdaye na varttate iti---tanayatīti varttamānanirddeśāt adyāpi hṛdaye vṛttyalābhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:538: atreti---rūpaṇādayaḥ kavervyāpārāḥ kaveśca prādhānyavyaṅgyabodhanārthā rūpaṇādayo vyāpārā yathātra camatkurvanti na tathā vācyeṣu /
GK16visa04cu:539: rūpakādyalaṅkāreṣu hi vācyānāṃ rūpyāṇāṃ mukhādīnāmeva rūpaṇādivyāpārād rūpakādibhyaścandrādibhyaśca prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:541: na khalu kaveḥ kavinibaddhasyeva rāgādyāviṣṭatā ataḥ kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktiḥ kaviprauḍhokteradhikaṃ sahṛdayavamatkārakāriṇīti pṛthakpratipāditā /
GK16visa04cu:545: nanu---prauḍhoktisiddhatvenaiva ubhayasaṃgrahasambhave kimarthaṃ kavinibaddhavaktṛkatvena pṛthagupādānamityata āha-na khalviti /
GK16visa04cu:552: gāḍhakāntadaśanetyādau darśitasya virodhālaṅkārasya vyañjakasya vācakāpikārābhāvād vyaṅgyatvameva,
GK16visa04cu:553: evaṃ sajjayati surabhimāsa ityādau vasantādeḥ śarakaraṇadirūpavastuno vyañjakasya vyaṅgyatvameva ityato 'tra prāyaśa iti pūraṇīyam /
GK16visa04cu:555: ata eva lakṣyavyaṅgyayorapi vyañjakatvamudāhāryyamiti tenoktam nanu rūpaṇameva rūpakālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:557: vyatirecanameva vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ tathā ca yatra rūpakālaṅkārasya vyaṅgayatvam tatra kiṃ rūpyamānavastūdāharaṇaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa04cu:559: evamutprekṣyamāṇavyatiricyamānavastunorityata āha--eṣu ceti--tattad vastavapekṣayā tadalaṅkāra eva ādhikacamatkārīti tattadudāharaṇameva tattat iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:561: diśi mandāyate ityatra vyatirekālaṅkāraśca vyaṅgya uktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:562: rūpakālaṅkāra vyaṅgyatvaṃ tu noktaṃ tathāpi--- calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatī rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:563: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara ! hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī //
GK16visa04cu:572: tattulyayuktike niḥ śeṣetyādau tadantikagamanaṃ lakṣyamityuktamitīdaṃ svoktiviruddham /
GK16visa04cu:582: śabdaśaktyutthe vyañjane tatprapañcasya arthaśaktyutthe vyañjane tatprapañcasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:584: na tu darśayiṣyamāṇodāharaṇe 'laṅkārasya vyaṅgyatvāt alaṅkārarūpatayā eka ityukta iti kenaciduktaṃ yuktam /
GK16visa04cu:586: bata vīra ! tava dviṣatāṃ parāṅmukhe tvayi parāṅmukhaṃ sarvam” //
GK16visa04cu:587_1: tvāmanuvarttate iti vastuvyañjanāyā api sambhavāt svataḥ sambhavyādyarthavyaṅgyatvena
GK16visa04cu:590: abhavatprasāditasuro mahotsavaḥ pramadājanasya sa cirāya mādhavaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:593: (vi, ṅa) himamukteti---mādhavaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pramadājanasya mahotsavo mahotsave hetuścirāya abhavat /
GK16visa04cu:596: sapadmakaḥ padmayā lakṣmyā hastapādastharekhārūpapadmena vā sāhitaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:599: prasāditāḥ prīṇitāḥ surā devā yena tādṛśaśca /
GK16visa04cu:600: atra mādhavo vasanto 'pi śabdaśaktyā arthaśaktyā ca vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:601: tathā hi mādhavaśabdasya vasante 'pi śaktyā sapadmaka ityatra sapadmakaśabdarūpasya padmasahite 'pi śaktyā,
GK16visa04cu:602: dvijān ityatra dvijaśabdasya pakṣiṣvapi śaktyā janitamīnaketana ityatra surāprasādane 'pyasya śabdasya śaktyā ca vasantapratyāyane śabda śaktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:604: tataśca vasantasyāprākaraṇikatvena tatpratyāyanasya prakṛte 'nupayogād vasanta iva kṛṣṇa ityupamāpratītiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:607: atra mādhavaḥ kṛṣṇo mādhavo vasanta ivetyupamālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:610: (lo, ṝ) himeti---himamuktacandra iva pakṣe himamuktacandreṇa ruciraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:612: mīnaketanaḥ pradyumnāvatāraḥ, sāmānyamadanaśca, surāḥ tridaśāḥ, murā madyam /
GK16visa04cu:614: atra mādhavaśabdapratipādyatayā harivasantayoḥ aupamyapratipādakasya himamukta ityādiśabdasya śabdaparivṛttisahatvādarthaśakterdārḍhyam /
GK16visa04cu:616: evaṃ ca vyaṅgyabhedādeva vyañjakānāṃ kāvyānāṃ bhedaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:624: pañcadaśeti--śabdaśaktyutthau dvau, arthaśaktyutthaśca dvādaśa, ubhayaśaktyutthe eva iti pañcadaśa /
GK16visa04cu:630: (lo, ḷ) śabdaparivṛttisahatvāsahatvābhyāmeva hi sarvatra śabdārthaśaktimūlatvasya vyavasthāpanam /
GK16visa04cu:631: ata eva cāsya bhedasya bahupadaniṣṭatvenaiva sambhavābhiprāyeṇa granthakṛtpadaniṣṭatvaṃ nāstīti vakṣyati /
GK16visa04cu:633: “pathia ṇa ettha“ityādau parivṛttyasaha eva strastarapayodharaśabdayoreva vyañjakatvamiti śabdaśaktimūlatvam /
GK16visa04cu:639: (vi, cha) vākya iti---ubhayaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātravyaṅgya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:641: tadanye iti---tadanye vyaṅgyāḥ padena vākyena ca vyaṅgyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:645: “dhanyaḥ sa eva taruṇo nayane tasyaiva nayane ca /
GK16visa04cu:650: (vi, ja) dvijīyanayataśabda iti---atra lakṣyārthasya atiśayo vyaṅgya iti vakṣyati /
GK16visa04cu:655: atra pratipādyasya saṃmukhīnatvādeva labdhe pratipādyatve tvāmiti punarvacanamanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭaṃ tvadarthaṃ takṣayati /
GK16visa04cu:657: tathā viduṣāṃ samavāya ityanenaiva vaktuḥ pratipādane siddhe punarvacmīti vacanamupadiśāmīti vacanaviśeṣarūpamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa04cu:659: etena mama vacanaṃ tavātyantaṃ hitaṃ tadavaśyameva kartavyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:684: anyeṣāṃ tu tadupakāritvameveti tanmūlaka eva dhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:691: na tu vyaṅgyam kintu vipralambha eva vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:692: tadādyanekapadānāṃ cātra na vākyatvaṃ vibhinnavākyasthatvena parasparānanvayāt /
GK16visa04cu:693: na ca tadā sudhāspadamabhūdityatra sarveṣāṃ tadādipadārthānāmanvayāt vākyatvameveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:694: tallāvaṇyamityanenaiva vipralambhavyañjanena tadā sudhāspadamityanvayāpekṣāṃ vinaiva vyañjaktvena padatvenaiva vyañjakatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:726: atra sadāgamaśabdaḥ sannahitamupanāyakaṃ prati sacchāstrārthamabhidhāya sataḥ puruṣasyāgama iti vastu vyanakti /
GK16visa04cu:732: nanu sadāgamaḥ sadāgama iveti na kathamupamādhvaniḥ ? sadāgamaśabdayorupamānopameyabhāvāvivakṣaṇāt /
GK16visa04cu:743: tasyā āsvādyatvābhāvāt tadupamāyā api anāsvādyatvena tāvatā sambandhīkaraṇasyāpi anupayogāt /
GK16visa04cu:746: rājate ko 'pi jagati sa rājā puruṣottamaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:753: asya padasyāpi śaktyā vyaṅgyatve 'pi na vākyavyaṅgyatvaṃ puruṣottamapadaśleṣādhīnapratītikatvādasya śliṣṭārthasya /
GK16visa04cu:754: upamādhvaniriti--asya puruṣottamapadasya saṅgopanādiprayojanakatvābhāvena upamāyāmeva tātparyyātsaṃlakṣyakramabhedau vastvalaṅkārau /
GK16visa04cu:757: āścaryaṃ tava saukumāryamabhitaḥ klāntāsi yenādhunā netradvandvamamīlanavyatikaraṃ śaknoti te nāsitum” //
GK16visa04cu:761: snānavartmani upanāyakopabhuktāṃ snātāgatāṃ klāntāṃ saśīṃ prati sakhyā upahāsoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:767: nanu snānāduttaraṃ muhūrttadvayātmakasāyaṃkāle ātapasattvāt tata eva klama ityatrāha--yāto 'steti /
GK16visa04cu:771: nanu klamaḥ kathaṃ jāta ityatrāha--yenādhunā iti /
GK16visa04cu:772: yena klamena tava netradvandvam amīlanavyatikaraṃ mīlanasambandharahitaṃ yathā syāttathā āsituṃ sthātuṃ na śakroti /
GK16visa04cu:775: sāyamiti---na vidyate mīlanena vyatikaraḥ samparko yatra tat amīlanavyatikaraṃ yathā syāttathā'situṃ sthātumityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:777: atra svataḥ saṃbhavinā vastunā kṛtaparapuruṣaparicayā klāntāsīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:779: na tu pūrvaṃ kadācidapi tavaivaṃvidhaḥ klamo dṛṣṭa iti bodhayato 'dhunā padasyaivetarapadārthotkarṣādasyaiva padāntarāpekṣayā vaiśiṣṭyam /
GK16visa04cu:788: svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyamalaṅkāraṃ padavyaṅgyamāha--tadaprāptītyādiślokadvayaṃ pūrvavarṇṇitavyavasāyād anyā gopakanyakā nirucchvāsatayā niruddhapraṇavāyutayā muktiṃ gatā /
GK16visa04cu:790: jagatsūtiṃ jagajjanakaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ tathāpi samastapāpapuṇyakṣaye eva muktirityatastadupapādayati--tadaprāptīti--taccinteti ca /
GK16visa04cu:793: na tasya prāṇā utkāmanti tatraiva samavalīyante; iti śruteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:797: atra ca vyañjakasya kaviprauḍhoktimantareṇāpi saṃbhavātsvataḥ saṃbhavitā /
GK16visa04cu:801: atreti---tadaprāptiduḥ khasya taccintāhlādasya copabhogena tajjanakapāpapuṇyayoreva kṣayaḥ sambhavati;
GK16visa04cu:807: yathā kamalamanambhasītyatra anukte upameye mukhe upamānakamalāropaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:808: prakṛtānītyatra upameyāni anuktāni uktasukhaduḥ khadūyaṃ cāprakṛtatvāt upamānāni atastadāropādatiśayoktidvayam /
GK16visa04cu:812: atra aśeṣacayapadayorekavākyasthatve 'pi dvābhyāṃ vyaṅgyadvayavyañjanānnaikavākyatvena vyañjakatvamataḥ padatvenaiva vyañjakatvam
GK16visa04cu:817: atra paśyantīti kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa na ke 'pyanye dātārastava sadṛśā iti vyatirekālaṅkāro 'saṃkhyapadadyotyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:822: tvaddānajalavāhinyā nadyā asaṃkhyapathagāmitvadarśanāt pathatrayagāminyā gaṅgāyā lajjayā śivāśirasi ātmagopanam /
GK16visa04cu:826: tadevaṃ dhvaneḥ pūrvokteṣvaṣṭādaśasu bhedeṣu madhye śabdārthaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātre bhavannekaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:827: anye punaḥ saptadaśa vākye pade ceti catustriṃśaditi pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:833: tadaprāptimahāduḥ khetyādiślokadvayasya mahāvākyatve 'pi tatra vyañjakapadadvayasattvāt tadvyaṅgyasyaivodāharaṇatvena taddarśitam /
GK16visa04cu:840: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśaī” //
GK16visa04cu:844: asya ca ślokasya padyāntarasacivasyaiva mahāvākyateti spaṣṭārtham /
GK16visa04cu:847: iti divā prabhavato gṛdhrasya śmaśāne mṛtaṃ bālamupādāya tiṣṭhatāṃ taṃ parityajya gamanamiṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:851: alaṃ sthitvetyati---śmaśāne mṛtabālakam atyajatastadvandhūn prati gṛdhravākyamidaṃ ślokadvayarūpaṃ mahāvākyam /
GK16visa04cu:854: tathā ca bālakaṃ tyaktvā yūyaṃ gacchadhvamiti vastu svataḥ sambhavivastunaḥ uktaprabandhārthasya vyaṅgyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:860: iti niśi samarthasya gomāyordivase parityāgo 'nabhilaṣita iti vākyasamahena dyotyate /
GK16visa04cu:866: vahuvighna iti--tathā ca vighnaśūnyamuhūrttāntare jāvanasambhāvanā darśitā /
GK16visa04cu:871: tathā ca ātrāpi svataḥ sambhavinā etatprabandhārthena vālakaparityāgānabhilāṣarūpaṃ vastu vyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:877: ataḥ svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā vasuta vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:878: udāhāryyamiti--tathā ca raghuvaṃśe“samayujyata bhūpatiryuvā“ityādinā“ubhayāṃ siddhimubhāvavāpatuḥ“ityante tulyayogitayā kāvyaliṅgena vā raghurāghavayorvyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:882: yathā māghakāvye śiśupāladūtoktau sandhau kāvye vastumātrarūpo vigrahaḥ upamādhvanirapi tathāvidhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GK16visa04cu:900: “calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:901: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara ! hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī” //
GK16visa04cu:902: atra “hatāḥ” iti na punaḥ “duḥkhaṃ prāptavantaḥ” iti hanprakṛteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:905: (vi, bha) calāpāṅgāmitiḥ śakuntalāṃ vyākulayantaṃ bhramaraṃ prati duṣyantasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:908: kiṃ vā tasya puṣṭakanyātvena matpariṇayayogyā ityevaṃ tattvasyānveṣaṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:914: padāṃśe iti--iha yadyapi prakṛtyādeḥ kevalasya na vyañjakatvam,
GK16visa04cu:917: tathā hyatra hatā ityasya sthāne ktapratyayaṃ sthāpayitvā hanaḥ sthāne prakṛtyantaraniveśane na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:920: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu” //
GK16visa04cu:925: muhuraṅgulīti---śakuntalāṃ prāpya tatsambhogavighne sati anutapyasānasya duṣyantasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:928: atreti---nañā eva cumbanābhāvalābhe tuśabdena cumbasya atyantavyavacchedalābhāt vipralambhānutāpātiśayo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:942: bahuvacanasyeti---mama eko 'pyarirnāsti bahu tatsattve sambhāvite viṣādaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:946: tiṅa iti---madanavadhāne pūrvaṃ nihantu, varttamānamapi hananamityatra viṣādaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:950: tathā hi--yadi luṇṭhane svargo 'pi svalpagrāmaḥ kapratyayavaśāt cātyantasvalpaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:954: nari nari kirati drāk sāyakān puṣpadhanvā puri puri ca nivṛttā māninīmānacarccā //
GK16visa04cu:959: nyakkāra ityādau udāharaṇadvaye padāṃśavyañjakatvasya prakṛtatve 'pi prasaṅgāt padavyañjakatvakathanam /
GK16visa04cu:961: “rāmo 'sau bhuvaneṣu vikamaguṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhiṃ parāmasmadbhāgyaviparyayādiha paraṃ devo na jānāti tam /
GK16visa04cu:962: vandī vaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marut yasyaikabāṇāhataśreṇībhūtaviśālaśālavivaroktīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhaiḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:964: bhuvaneṣvityatra bahuvacanena guṇairityatra prakṛtyā bahuvacanena ca /

GK16visa04cu:967: saṃprati tu anavadhānena tasya viparyayo jāta iti pratipādanādātmānā pratipādanena ca te te sahṛdayasaṃvedyā arthāḥ pratīyante /
GK16visa04cu:968: tathā saktotphulletyādau hareḥ paśyata ityatrānādaraṣaṣṭhyā kiñca na kevalaṃ rasādidhvanereva padāṃśaprakāśatā,
GK16visa04cu:976: nāsāgre nayanaṃ tadetadaparaṃ yaccaikatānaṃ manaḥ . maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamadhunā yadviśvamābhāti te,
GK16visa04cu:981: (vi, ra) āhāre iti--dhyāyantīṃ viyoginīṃ yogadharmiṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā kasyacidiyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa04cu:984: tava sthāne yadā viśvaṃ śūnyamābhāti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:989: ābhāti” ityupasargasya “sakhi” iti praṇayasmāraṇasya “asi bhoḥ” iti sotprāsasya “kiṃ vā” ityuttarakṣadārḍhyasūcakasya vāśabdasya,
GK16visa04cu:997: na tu yat kiñcidviṣaye etad viśeṣaṇasya samāsapadaikadeśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1005: āṅupasargeṇa mithyātvarūpaṃ samyak pratibhāti iti bhāvabodhanāt vipralambhavyañjanam /
GK16visa04cu:1006: praṇayasmaraṇasyeti--tena dṛśyamāno vipralambho na tvayā gopanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1038: ekapañcāśaditi---pūrvadarśitāḥ pañcatriṃśat kulakarūpamahāvakyavyaṅgyāḥ dvādaśapadaikadeśādivyaṅgyāḥ catvāra ityekapañcāśat eṣāṃ parasparayojane saṃkhyāṃ darśayati---saṅkareti /
GK16visa04cu:1039: aṅgāṅgitvarūpeṇa ekāśrayānupraveśarūpeṇa saṃdigdharūpeṇa ca trividhena saṃkareṇa yojane tasya trirūpatā /
GK16visa04cu:1044: ebiryāḥ saṃkhyā bhavanti tā āhavedeti---“aṅkānāṃ vāmataḥ krama';
GK16visa04cu:1050: ekasyaiva svajātīyena ekena svasvajātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā ca caturguṇane ekasyaiva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1051: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrveṇa saha cāturvidhyaṃ pūrvagaṇanāyāṃ praviṣṭamityataḥ tasya cāturvidhyasya agaṇyatvāt tasya dviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1052: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrvaddhābhyāṃ catuścaturvidhatvasya agaṇyatvāt caturnyūnadviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1053: evaṃ rītyā caramasya caturūpatvamātraṃ guṇyamiti bhavatyuktarūpā saṃkhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1054: kāvyaprakāśe tu darśitakrameṇa kramaśo hrasamāvicāryya sarveṣāmeva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvena ekapañcāśata eva tādṛśasaṃkhyātvena “vedakhāgniviyaccandrāḥ';
GK16visa04cu:1056: vastutastu atyantavicāre vedakhāgniśararūpā yā saṃkhyā granthakṛtā darśitā sāpi na sambhavati /
GK16visa04cu:1057: tathā hi ekapañcāśata eva uktacāturvidhyaṃ na sambhavati,
GK16visa04cu:1063: (lo, ū) tadevamiti---evaṃ vyaṅgyasya padavākyagatatveṅgavṛttau pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1065: rasasya padāṃśavarṇaracanāprabandhagatatvena catvāra iti militvā dhvanikāvyasya ekapañcaśadbhedāḥ śuddhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1067_1: saṃsṛṣṭyā cānyo 'nyamiśraṇe śuddhabhedānāmeva pañcāśataḥ sambhūya vedāścatvāraḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1073: tathā hi prathamabhedasya sajātīyamiśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ;
GK16visa04cu:1074: vijātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā pratyekaṃ dhvaninā vimaśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ iti militvā caturadhikaṃ bhedaśatadvayaṃ dvitīyasya bhedaśatadvayameva /
GK16visa04cu:1078: evaṃ tṛtīye 'ṣṭau caturthe dvādaśa iti krameṇānyeṣāmapi svakīyādyabhedāpekṣayā sarveṣāṃ bhedacatuṣṭayapātanam /
GK16visa04cu:1081: pañca agrayaḥ trayaḥ sāyakāḥ pañca evaṃ pañcasahastrāṇi śatatrayaṃ pañcāśat pañca ca;“5355“
GK16visa04cu:1082: jratra agrimāgrimabhedasya yojane ekaikabhedahrāsāt evaṃ prakāreṇa evaṃ yojanaṃ bhavati /
GK16visa04cu:1096: atyunnateti---pravāsādāgacchantaṃ patiṃ dvāri sthitvā dṛṣṭavatīṃ nāyikāṃ kasmiṃścinnivedayataḥ kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1111: tathā nistandra unnidraḥ candraḥ tādṛśavadanāyāḥ yad vadanāravindaṃ tasya saurabhyaṃ saugandhyaṃ tasya sauhṛdena saṃparkeṇa sagarvāḥ samīraṇā yatra tādṛśāni /
GK16visa04cu:1112: atreti candrasya nidrābhāvāt tandrāpadasyāprakāśe lakṣaṇā samīraṇasyotkṛṣṭatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam,
GK16visa04cu:1113: tathā samīraṇasya garvābhāvāt utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇā sukhasparśatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam /
GK16visa04cu:1117_0: alidhvanicandrasamīraṇaiḥ kāmoddīpakaiḥ vyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya apyatra pratītirityatastasya
GK16visa04cu:1117_1: candrojjvalatvena samīraṇotkṛṣṭatvena tasya sukhasparśatvena ca lakṣaṇāmūlakavyaṅgye
GK16visa04cu:1120: yathā--- khaṇapāhuṇiā deara jāāe kiṃ pide bhāṇiā /
GK16visa04cu:1123: kṣaṇaprāghuṇikā devara jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16visa04cu:1126: gṛhapatiprasaktāmupanāyikāmutsave tadgṛhāgatāṃ tatpatnyā bhartsitāṃ paścāt gṛhe rudatīmanunetuṃ gṛhapatijyeṣṭhabhrātṛpatnyāḥ sopahāsoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1127: atra kṣaṇa utsavastatra prāghuṇakā abhyāgatā utsavāgatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1128: taddevara sā te tava jāyayākimapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitā satī paścādvalabhīgṛhe roditīti /
GK16visa04cu:1133: ayaṃ kiṃ svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyavastudhvaniḥ kiṃvā anunayapade upabhogalakṣaṇā;
GK16visa04cu:1134: tadvyaṅgya tasyāḥ duḥ khāpasāraṇamityayamarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyalakṣaṇā mūladhvaniriti dhvanyoḥ saṃśayāspadatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1153: bhedāstasyoditi iti--tasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyakāvyasya evamaṣṭavidhavyaṅgyabhedāt tasyāṣṭau bhedā uditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1156: evaṃ dhvanyākhyaṃ kāvyasya bhedaṃ nirupya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamavatārayati atheti--tatra syāditi---kākkā ākṣiptaṃ vācyavat sphuṭīkṛtam /
GK16visa04cu:1171: rasāderaṅgaṃ rasādi ityubhayatra ādipadāt bhāvādyaṅgatāpi rasādeḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1173: ayaṃ sa iti---bhūriśravasaḥ samarapatitaṃ hastamādāya rudatyāstatpatnyā uraktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1174: atreti---rasotkarṣaṇādinā vyaṅgyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ mṛtālambanakatvena rasatāmanāpanno mṛtālambanakasya karuṇasyāṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1175: rasatāpannasya tasya śṛṅgāreṇa prakarṣaṇāt pūrvānubhūtasukhasmaraṇe hi karuṇaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1180: rasaśabdenātra bhāvādīnāmupagrahaḥ ādiśabdena vācyasyāṅgam utkarṣakārirasādi atrādiśabdādanuraṇanarūpam / ayaṃ sa iti ---idaṃ hi mahābhārate,
GK16visa04cu:1185: hā !hā! kathaṃ nu bhavato ripurājadhānīprāsādasaṃtatiṣu tiṣṭhati kāmilokaḥ //
GK16visa04cu:1191: bhavato ripurājadhānīprasādasantatiṣu kathaṃ kamilokastiṣṭhati iti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1194: tādṛśasandiviśiṣṭānāṃ ripurājadhānīkāmilokānāṃ śocyāvasthājñāturvaktuḥ śokarūpaḥ karuṇo rājaviṣayaratibhāvasyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1196: śokavyañjaka iti granthakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ tadaiva vyaṅgyabhūtasya hāhāśabdapratipādyasya śokarūpakaruṇasya vyaṅgyatvopapatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1203: “janasthāne bhrāntaṃ kanakamṛgatṛṣṇāndhitadhiyā vaco vaidehīti pratipadamudaśru pralapitam /
GK16visa04cu:1204: kṛtālaṅkābharturvadanaparipāṭīṣu ghaṭanā māyāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśalavasutā na tvadhigatā” //
GK16visa04cu:1209: mayā rāmatvaṃ prāptaṃ rāmasadṛśo 'haṃ jāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1211_0: mayā kanakarūpayā mṛgatṛṣṇayā marīcikāyāndhitadhiyā janānāṃ sthāne bhrāntam asāre
GK16visa04cu:1212: mayā vai iti sambodhya pratipadaṃ sthāne dehīti vacaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1213_0: mayā bharttuḥ īśvarasya paripāṭīṣu paricaryyāsu aṃlamityarthakā ghaṭanā na kṛtā tadvat
GK16visa04cu:1213_1: rāmeṇāpi laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paripāṭanasya nimittamiṣughaṭanā kṛtā //
GK16visa04cu:1214: kintu kuśalaṃ dāridṣāpanāyakaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya tādṛśatā tu mayā na prāptā /
GK16visa04cu:1215: atra tuśabdena rāmavāk chedāt rāmeṇa tu kuśalavasutā prāptā ityarthaḥ pratīyate--tatra ca kuśalavau sutau yasyāstādṛśī sītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1218: aṅgaparipoṣakatvād vācyāṅgabhūtamanuraṇanarūpaṃ śabdaśaktimūlamudāharati-evaṃ ca rasabhāvāderaṅgaṃ rasabhāvādi,
GK16visa04cu:1223: kanakamṛge tṛṣṇā ca vai niścitaṃ; dehi prayaccha; videhajā sītā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1225: kābharttuḥ kutsitasvāminaḥ yad vadanaṃ tasya paripāṭīṣu paramparāsu laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya
GK16visa04cu:1226: vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paṅktau iṣughaṭanā śarayogaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1227: kuśalam āyatiśuddhaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya evaṃbhūtatā, kuśalavau sutau yasyāḥ sā sītā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1235: atra viṣādādhikyavyañjakayā kuśalavasutāprāptyā prāptatatkāt rāmāt upamānād vailakṣaṇyarūpo vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ naño vācyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1237: tadaṅgamiti manasikṛtya vyaṅgyasya sādṛśyasya agūḍhatvāt guṇībhūtatvamupapādayitumāha--atra rāmatvamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1242: tadāropaśca sādṛśyamūlakaḥ ityāha---sādṛśyaheturiti---āviṣkurvātā vaktrā tad gopanaṃ dhvanitvahetutadrūḍhatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1244: yadyapi ekaśabdarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ śrotragrāhyameva na tu vākyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1246: tathāpi śabdasya sādṛśyatvena rūpeṇa vyaṅgyatvameva na śrotragrahyatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1248: na ca tad gopanāt agūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda evāyamiti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1250: vācyārtho rāmavyatireko naño vācyaḥ, tatprakarṣānvayopapādakatayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1251: na tu rāmavyatirekasyānvayaniṣpādakatayā abādhitatvena tad vināpi tanniṣpatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1255: tathā ca vyatirekālaṅkāraśarīraghaṭakameva sādṛśyam; kathaṃ tatprakarṣakamiti cenna /
GK16visa04cu:1256: ekaviśeṣaṇenāpi tad ghaṭanasambhave bahuviśeṣaṇasambhavāttatprakarṣakatvamapi labhyate tacca sahṛdayaikavedyam /
GK16visa04cu:1259: atreti vacane tu rāmo 'smītyuktvā punaḥ sādṛśyahetukatādātmyaropaṇaṃ janasthāna ityādi vacanapratipādanenāpi labhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1263: vyaṅgyamiti pāṭhe tu sugamā eva vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1269: “mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopādduḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na pibāmyutarastaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1270: saṃcūrṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorūṃ sandhi karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena” //
GK16visa04cu:1271: atra mathnāmyevetyādivyaṅgyaṃ vācyasya niṣedhasya sahabhāvenaiva sthitam /
GK16visa04cu:1276: mathnāmīti---duryoghanena saha sandhikaraṇe pravṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śrutvā kuddhasya bhīmasya sahadevaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1277: bhavatāmityanena asmākam asamīhitakāritvāt nāsmākaṃ nṛpatiriti sūcitam /
GK16visa04cu:1281: tayā vyañjanayā aparanañor'thopasthāpanāt na mathnāmītyartho labhyate /
GK16visa04cu:1296: vācyasiddhyaṅgamudāharati---anupannasya vācyārthasya yad vyaṅgyānvayenaiva siddhiḥ tādṛśaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyasiddhyaṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1299_0: anvayasāya vairikulasya vaṃśapadavācyasya veṇutvaropaṇarūpo vyaṅgaya iti kulaveṇudvayārthakasya
GK16visa04cu:1299_1: vaṃśapadasya prakaraṇāt kule niyantraṇena veṇo stad vyaṅgyatvena tadrūpaṇasyāpi vyaṅgyatvāt
GK16visa04cu:1299_2: davānalatvāropasiddhyaṅgamiti kule davā nalavādhena veṇāveda tad bādhāt /
GK16visa04cu:1301: yadi prakaraṇavaśāt anekārthasya vaṃśapadasya prathamaṃ kulabodhakatvam;
GK16visa04cu:1302: tadaiva veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyo bhavati tadeva tu na;
GK16visa04cu:1304: kintu kulaveṇyorubhayorekadā eva davānalānvayārthaṃ tātparyyād vaṃśayorupasthityā arthadvayameva vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1305: natu veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyastathā ca paramparitarūpamevedaṃ veṇutvarūpaṇasya davānalarūpaṇakāraṇatvāt tad vakṣyati svayameva--- “yatra kasyacidāropaḥ parāropasya kāraṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1310: “iti atra hi rājamaṇḍalasya grāsakarūpasambandhitayā rāhuvādhāt bāhau rāhurūpaṇamanupapannamato nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalatvasyāropo bāhau rāhurupaṇakāraṇamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1311: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi sadvaṃśamuktāmaṇirityatra rājño muktāmaṇyāropaṇasya satkule bādhāt satkule saha veṇuropaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1312: ato dīpayan rodasīrandhramityādikaṃ paramparitarūpakodāharaṇameva, na vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1314: na hi dīpayan ityādau āhave jagaduddaṇḍetyādau ca ekasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvamanyasya paramparitarūpakatvamityatravinigamakaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa04cu:1315: vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇaṃ tu-- “gacchāmyacyuta ! darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptirutpadyate kintvevaṃ vijanasthagrerhatajanaḥ sambhāvayatyanyathā /
GK16visa04cu:1319_1: ! madvidhanāyikādarśanenāpi dhairyyacyutarahita ityevaṃvidhāyāḥ bhaṅgyāḥ pratītyaiva siddhayati /
GK16visa04cu:1320: na ca nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalāropaṇamapi vyaṅgyaṃ sadevālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1323: prathamaṃ nṛpamaṇḍale rāhoranvayāsambhāvena rājamaṇḍalapadādekadaiva nṛpacandramaṇaaḍalayoḥ upasthityā drayorapi vācyatvācca /
GK16visa04cu:1324: nanu tatkatham--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ praṇayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16visa04cu:1325: maraṇaṃ ca jaladadabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām /
GK16visa04cu:1326: “ityatra viśeṣajale rūpetaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ bhujagarupaṇasiddhikṛdityuktyā halāhalasya vyaṅgyatvamuktvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtā vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇatvena taduktamiti cenna /
GK16visa04cu:1327: tatra uddīpakatayā prākaraṇikamanekārthasya viṣaśabdasyārtho jalam ityato 'prākaraṇikaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1328: na ca dīpayannityatrāpi prākaraṇikatvena vaṃśapadārthakulavācyaṃ veṇustu aprākaraṇiko vyaṅgya eveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1329: davānalarūpaṇasyāpi tātparyyaviṣayatvena tasya kule bādhena tadupapādanatayā veṇorapi prākaraṇikatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1332: bhramimaratimityādau tu jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ śyāmatvenāpakāritvena ca jale halāhalarūpaṇaṃ vināpi āpātataḥ siddhatyeveti halāhalamaprākaraṇikamityato vyaṅgyameva /
GK16visa04cu:1333: parantu praṇidhāne sati jalasya bhujagajanyatvāsambhavena bhajagarūpaṇāsiddhyā tatsiddhikāritvena paścājjale halāhalarūpaṇamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1335: “harastu kiṃcitparivṛttadhairyaḥ--” ityādau ((22.pṛ dṛ) vilocanavyapāralāṣayoḥ prādhānye saṃdehaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1340: kiṃ vācyārthena kiṃ vā vyaṅgyārthena vyañjito 'yaṃ ityevaṃ sandehaviṣayatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa04cu:1341: halastviti kumārasambhave ākālike vasante jāte sarveṣāmeva kāmodreke sati halasyāpi kiñcit tathātvavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1345: cumbanābhilāṣastu vyaṅgyaḥ taddvayamapi śṛṅgāranubhāvastat kena raso vyañjita iti sandehāt /
GK16visa04cu:1346: na ca dvābhyāmeva vyajyatāṃ, tathā ca tulyaprādhānyodāharaṇameva hadamastviti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1347: dhairyyaparivṛtteḥ kiñcittvena cumbanābhilāṣo jāto na vā;
GK16visa04cu:1348: iti sandehena nadīyarasavyañjakatāyā api tadadhīnasandehāt ata eva vācyārthena tadvyañjanamapi saṃdigdhameva /
GK16visa04cu:1354: atra paraśurāmo rakṣaḥkulakṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasya ca samaṃprādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1358: tulyaprādhānyamāha---brāhmaṇeti---digvijaye paraśurāmaṃ jigīṣuṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati tadamātyasya tattrāsakavākyamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1359: bhavatāmeva bhūtaye na tu svārtha bravīmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1369: atreti--atra vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ sāmadaṇḍayostulyatayaiva vairamocane paryyāptātvādaprastutapraśaṃsāvat parasparānapekṣayā camatkārāspadatvāt dvayorapi samaṃ prādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1373: atrāllāvadīnākhye nṛpatau dānasāmādimantareṇa nānyaḥ praśamopāya iti vyaṅgyaṃ vyutpannānāmapi jhaṭityasphuṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1377: jhaṭityasphuṭamiti tat praśamopāyo nāstyeva iti hi vyaṅgyamāpātataḥ pratibhāti /
GK16visa04cu:1387: atra pratīyamāno 'pi śākyamunestiryagyoṣiti bālātkāropabhogaḥ sphuṭatayā vācyāyamāna ityagūḍham /
GK16visa04cu:1392: ahaṃ vratavatīti dharmopadeśinaḥ asya upabhogo mama vratabhaṅgāya no bhaviṣyatītyato 'haṃ vratavatyeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1393: svairaṃ svacchandam ataḥ param uktena kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1395: pratīyamānasya prāyaśo 'sphuṭatvena sphuṭatve tad virodhe 'trāpikāraḥ sphuṭatayeti---prabandhaślokātprakaraṇavaśād balātkaropabhogajñānāt sphuṭatā /
GK16visa04cu:1400: prajjvālitasya rajanīṃ madanānalasya dhūmaṃ dadhat prakaṭalāñchanakaitavena” /
GK16visa04cu:1401: atra cumbīti pade vadanasaṃsargarūpasāyarthasyāsambhavāt saṃsargamātraṃ lakṣyaṃta tadatiśayaścābhidheyavat sphuṭaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:1405: atra dattasaṃketaḥ jaścillatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyāt “sīdantyaṅgani” iti vācyasya camatkāraḥ sahṛdayasaṃvedya ityasundaram /
GK16visa04cu:1413: vānīrakuñje kṛtasaṃketāyā gṛhakarmavyāpārāt tatra gantumaśaktāyā vadhvā aṅgāvasādavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1414: atreti--praviṣṭa ityantamātraṃ na vyaṅgyaṃ vadhvāstatrāgamanasyāpi tadīyapakṣikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāṅgāvasādena vyaṅgyatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1415: tathā ceti--vyaṅgyādityatra ityādi vyaṅgyādityarthaḥ vācyasya camatkāra iti vadhvā vipralambhavyañjakatvena hyatra camatkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1417: vadhvā īdṛśakāryyatyāgenāpi tatrāgamanasambhavādṛte vācyāṅgāvasādamukhaprekṣatvena tasya nyūnacamatkāritetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1423: kiñca yo dīpakatulyayogitādiṣūpamādyalaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ sa guṇībhūtavyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa04cu:1427: tatparatvaṃ na kāvyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1430: (vi, ṭha) asundarasya bahūnyudāharaṇāni sambhavantīti darśayitumāha---kiñca yo dīpaketi /
GK16visa04cu:1435: alaṅkārāntarasyāpi pratītau satyāṃ yaccālaṅkārāntaraṃ bhasata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1438: yatreti pāṭhe tu yatra kāvye bhāsate ityalaṅkāra iti kartṛpadamadhyāhāryyam /
GK16visa04cu:1440: (lo, u) idānīmanyatrāpi vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvasthale dhvanibhramaṃ nirasyan āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa04cu:1442: kāvyasya ca tatparatvaṃ na bhāsata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1448_1: dhvanitvaṃ tad viparyyāso vyaktīkāraṇaṃ yatra śabdāntarādinā kriyate so 'gūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1451: “dṛṣṭyā keśava ! goparāgahṛtayā kiṃcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenātra skhalitāsmi nātha ! patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK16visa04cu:1452: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyevaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādroṣṭhe harirvaściram” //
GK16visa04cu:1456: dṛṣṭyeti---keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā madanāndhatayā goṣṭe patitāyā gopyāḥ saleśaṃ saśleṣaṃ gadito hariściramavatāt /
GK16visa04cu:1457: dṛṣṭyetyādi--saśleṣoktiḥ tatra vācyārtho yathā---he keśava gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā naṣṭayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcit na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1460: he nātha ! patitāṃ māṃ kiṃ nālambase /
GK16visa04cu:1461: kathamālambiṣye ityatrāha---ekastvamiti---viṣameṣūñcanīceṣu vartmasu khinnamanasāṃ patnena klāntahṛdayānāṃ sarvābalānāṃ sakalabalarahitānāṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca yatastvaṃ gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1463: rāgeṇa tvayyanurāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcinnijatiroṣādikaṃ na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1465: he nātha ! patitāṃ patibhāvaṃ bharttṛtvaṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase nāśrayasi /
GK16visa04cu:1466: yato viṣameṣuṇā pañceṣuṇā khinnamanasāṃ sarvāsām abalānāṃ tvameko gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1468: (lo, ū) dṛṣṭyeti---gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā tiraskṛtayā /
GK16visa04cu:1469: gāḥ indriyāṇi sambhāgadānādinā pātīti gopaḥ tasmin gope tvayi,
GK16visa04cu:1470: rāgeṇa pramṇā hṛtayā vaśīkṛtayā skhalitā bhraṣṭapādā gatadhairyyā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1471: atha patitāṃ mārgapatitāṃ dhavatvaṃ ca nāvalambase na dhārayasi na parigṛhaṇāsi ca /
GK16visa04cu:1472: viṣameṣu uccanīcasthāneṣu, viṣameṣuḥ kāmaḥ tena ca khinnamanasām /
GK16visa04cu:1475: atra goparāgādiśabdānāṃ gope rāga ityādivyaṅgyārthānāṃ saleśamiti padena sphuṭatayāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1478: (vi, ṇa) sphuṭayeti---śleṣavaśādeva tatpratīteḥ saleśapadena tat sphuṭīkaraṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1480: na tvanaucityapravarttitarūparasābhāsaḥ tad gopane 'pi paranāyakaviṣayatvena tadavaśyaṃbhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1484: yatra vastvalaṅkārasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ rasābhyantare guṇībhāvastatra pradhānakṛta eva kāvyavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1488: kvacittu vyaṅgye guṇībhūte 'pi dhvanikāvyavyavahāra eva na guṇībhūtavyavahāra ityāha---kiñcātra yatra vastviti /
GK16visa04cu:1491: na cedaṃ kathamupapadyate īdṛśasthale 'parāṅgākhyaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyaivoktatvāt iti vācyam,
GK16visa04cu:1492: yatra guṇībhūtānāmalaṅkārasādīnāmaṅgijanakatvameva natvaṅgi prakarṣakatvaṃ tatraivāṅgino vyañjakaviśeṣaṇatvenāṅgina eṣa camatkāritvāt dhvanivyavahārat /
GK16visa04cu:1493_0: yathā ca calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭimityatra madhukarakāmukarūpālaṅkārasya vyaṅgyasya hatā iti
GK16visa04cu:1494: yathā--- “jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā māṃ saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1495: no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ bhratastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrāharidrīkṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1496: ityatra vidhiṃ pratyasūyādhvanireva śaṭhapadena vyañjakaviśeṣeṇa vyaktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1497: no yāvadāśvāsayāmi ityanena vyaṅgyasya vipralambhasya tu asūyājanakatvameva nāsūyāprakarṣakatvamityato nāparāṅgatvamityādi svayamūhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1500: pradhānena rasenaiva kāvyavyavahāro na tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena /
GK16visa04cu:1501: tathā ca tatrottamakāvyatvameva ityarthaḥ yathā“ayaṃ sa rasanotkarṣo“tyādaveva hi tatra śṛṅgārasya guṇībhāve 'pi taṃ bhāgamavalambya madhyamakāvyavyavahāro 'pi na karttavyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1511: kvacittu prakāraṇagmye vastuni tātparyyasattvena aṅgībhūtarasādau tātparyyābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāribhistairaṅgabhūtai rasādyaireva parāṅgavyavahāra ityāha /
GK16visa04cu:1518: yatra tu yatronmadānāmiti---atra pure 'bhraṃlihaḥ meghasparśo śoṇamaṇīmayūkhaḥ padmarāgamaṇīnāṃ raśmiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1519: sandhyābhramaṃ tādṛśaraśmisañcaraṇādeva sandhyākāle iti bhrāntiṃ prāpnuvatāmunmadānāṃ madanamattānāṃ pramadājanānāmanaṅganepathyavidhiṃ kāmasambhogaveśaṃ vidhatta ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1527: atra hi prakaraṇāt purāprakarṣe tātparyyasattvena anaṅganepathyavidhānavyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya tātparyyaviṣayatvābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāritvalābhenaivāparāṅgavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1531: kālāntare tu prakaraṇādiparyālocanayā bhavannapyasau na kāvyavyavadeśaṃvyāhantumīśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1539: tatra āpātatastadananubhave 'pi uttarakālaṃ prakaraṇādiparyyālocanayā purīprakarṣaprādhānyāvagamo bhavannapi kāvyasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśaṃ vyāhantuṃ neśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1542: tathāca apradhānenāpi śṛṅgāreṇā'svādāt na guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1556: tanna, yadi hi avyaṅgyatvena vyaṅgyābhāvastadā tasya kāvyatvamapi nāstīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:1559: (vi, pa) kāvyaprakāśakṛtā citrākhyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāvyamucyate taddūṣayitumāha---keciditi /
GK16visa04cu:1562: saguṇāviti taiḥ kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte vyaṅgyarasadvāreṇaiva ca saguṇatvena vyaṅgyābhāve saguṇatvābhāvāt kāvyatvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1574: āsvādyavyaṅgyatve eva kāvayatvāṅgīkārāt idaṃ ca svakapolakalpitaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1576: nanu āsvādye eva tāratamyānna prācīnadvayāntarbhāva ityata āha---yadi cāsvādyatvamiti---tadā kṣudratvameveti---prācīnabhedadvayāt asyālpatvamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1577: astu tāvat kṣudratvaṃ tu kāvyatvāprayojakatvenānupādeyatvādanāsvādyatvameva ityāha---kṣudratāyāmiti---tathā ca dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyaṃ dvayameva kāvyam /
GK16visa04cu:1578: citrākhyaṃ padyaṃ na tu kāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1589: evamuktaprabandhena vyaṅgyasya pradhānaguṇabhāvābhyām ubha eva kāvye vyavasthite /
GK16visa04cu:1591: tatra kāvyavyavahārastu sādharmyād gauṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1597: ucyate vakṣyate ca--tasya ca vyaṅgyasya prādhānyāprādhānyābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau bhedau,
GK16visa04cu:1598: tayorapi pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyasya vastvalaṅkārasarūpatvena traividhyamityuktaprakāreṇātmanā eva ātmano bhedaḥ prabhedaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1599: iti durupapādaḥ sāmānyalaśraṇaśca vyāpteḥ iti cet;
GK16visa04cu:1600: atrocyate-yadi vayaṃ rasavattvākhyasya kāvyasāmānyalakṣaṇasya vastvalaṅkāravyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyabhedayorabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ tadaiṣa
GK16visa04cu:1609: ata evāhuḥ---rasādyapekṣayā tu sarvaguṇābhāvavyabhicāra eva iti /
GK16visa04cu:1610: nanu tarhi kathaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamityādau vastudhvaneḥ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1611: tatra hi dautyakarmajīvikāyāṃ kṛtaghnāyāṃ tvayi tasmin adhame śaṭhe ca mama nāsūyā,
GK16visa04cu:1618: nanvevamalaṃ yathākathañcit prādhānyamupakalpya vastvalaṅkārarūpayordhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyoḥ kāvyavyavahārapravarttakoktyā rasadhvanināpi sa nivarttatāmiti cet,
GK16visa04cu:1619: atrāha kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ---“samanantaroktaṃ yadyapi sa nāsti kaścidviṣaya iti /
GK16visa04cu:1620: pradhānaṃ cāpātamātreṇa āparyantaṃ pradhānena rasena eva vyapadeśaḥ” /
GK16visa04cu:1621: tathā tenaivoktamalaṅkāraprastāve---“rasādirūpastadvyaṅgyor'tholaṅkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvā eva tadalaṅkārā udāhṛtāḥ” /
GK16visa04cu:1625: yatra khalu samāsoktyādyalaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyasya vaiṣadyenāpi pratītiḥ, na teṣu dhvanerantarbhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1631: kiñca kvacit kadācit yatrālaṅkāre vyaṅgyasyāsvādaprakarṣakatvena prādhānyamapi yathāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ---
GK16visa04cu:1632: “jaṃ vellihiṇa ma asi jaṃ cāsi paraviraṃ pilaghemaṃ /
GK16visa04cu:1633: tamaṇḍe kohali ajjaṃ valaṃ piphuli haṃsi” //
GK16visa04cu:1634: ityādāvacamatkāraiṇaḥ kuṇḍākarṣaṇārthāt prastutāt gṛhakarmaratyā yuvānaṃ prati nāyikāyā aprasaṅganiṣedhāya prastutasya bālāyā yauvanodbhedakathanasya tasya dhvanau antarbhāvo 'stu,
GK16visa04cu:1636: evaṃ cālaṅkāreṣu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāntarbhāve eṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1637: kiñca dīpakatulyayogitādau yeyamupapādyālaṅkāṇṇāṃ pratītirna tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyākāvyabhedāntaḥ pāto 'nāsvādyatvāt vyaṅgyasya,
GK16visa04cu:1639: ata eva kavipratibhāsaṃrambhagocaratvaṃ teṣu nāstīti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1641: kintu vācyāpekṣayā āsvādapakarṣa iti teṣu ucito guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyakāvyavyavahāraḥ /
